main.changelog:
Changelog:
Pedal
- Accelerated Kalman filter response for faster readings.
- Implemented force outlier detection and automatic skipping.
- Loadcell bias and variance are now represented in kilograms.
- Refactored dap_config_st into a class structure.
- Servo alarm codes are now decoded into readable strings.
- Enabled logging over ESP-NOW.
- Added ability to display RSSI of incoming ESP-NOW packets.
- Firmware version: 0.90.07

Bridge
- Added support to receive and print pedal log strings sent via ESP-NOW.
- Resolved issue where no logs were shown when brake configuration was sent.
- Firmware version: 0.90.07

Plugin
- Added action to display pedal info; if received via ESP-NOW, also show RSSI.
- UI enhancements: added separator lines between buttons.
- Introduced one-click plugin updater via PowerShell.
- Moved update settings to a dedicated window. You can now enter Wi-Fi credentials, choose the update channel, and review the changelog before proceeding. Available only when using FW OTA or Plugin Update.
- Plugin version: 0.90.07

Rudder
- Switched force reading filter from velocity-based Kalman filter to exponential filter with a noise factor of 200.
- Updated movement filter from average filter to Kalman filter.

dev-build.changelog:
Nightly build changelog:
0.90.08:
Pedal
- Added ADS1220 support for V6 board
- Modified force-curve with segmented travel support
- New pedal configuration supports up to 11 control points
- OTA package renamed
- DAP version: 150
- Firmware version: 0.90.08

Bridge
- Updated DAP version to 150
- Firmware version: 0.90.08

Plugin
- Removed CDC serial function for bridge
- Removed DAP version check in serial
- Force-travel curve is now adjustable
- Right-click on the force-curve canvas to add control points (max: 11)
- Right-click on control points to remove them (min: 6)
- Updated config to support up to 11 control points
- DAP version: 150
- Plugin version: 0.90.08

0.90.09:
Pedal
- Improved ADS1220 support
- Fixed an issue where rudder calculations exceeded the endstop
- Firmware version: 0.90.09

Bridge
- Firmware version: 0.90.09

Plugin
- Improved JSON parser compatibility for older configurations
- Fixed an issue where the status indicator did not work when Advanced Mode was disabled
- Fixed a bug where bridge serial logs did not appear with Advanced Mode disabled
- Added an update checker to notify you when a new stable release is available
- Plugin version: 0.90.09
0.90.10:
Pedal

- Firmware version: 0.90.10 
- Changed rudder packet transmission from unicast to broadcast
- Added helicopter rudder action 



Bridge

- Firmware version: 0.90.10



Plugin

- Plugin version:0.90.10 
- Rudder refinements (see Rudder section)



Rudder

- Added rudder mode selection (Flight/ Helicopter) 
- Added helicopter mode*
- Force-travel curve is now fully adjustable   
  - Right-click the canvas to add a control point   
  - Right-click a control point to remove it   
  - Supports 6 to 11 control points 
- Plugin now remembers the last-used rudder configuration* 
  - Import/export still available as needed

0.90.11:
Pedal

- Fixed a bug where the pedal would not return in MPC control mode  
- Fixed an issue where spindle pitch was not set during config initialization  
- Increased baudrate to 3M for CH343 chip boards (V4/V5/V6/PCBA v2.0)  
- Added support for V6 board  
- Added emergency button function for PCBA v2.0 users  
- Firmware version: 0.90.11

---

Bridge

- Joystick updates only when pedal joystick value changes  
- Removed Wi-Fi power limit  
- Firmware version: 0.90.11

---

Plugin

- COM port display now shows only chip or device name  
- Increased serial baudrate to 3M for CH343 series boards (V4/V5/V6/PCBA v2)  
- Plugin version: 0.90.11

---

Rudder

- Changed helicopter mode notification to Airwolf

0.90.12:
Pedal:
-fix an issue that pedal stuck at end with MPC mode. 

0.90.13:
Pedal
- Added joystick mapping functionality, including support for deadzones at the beginning and end.
- DAP version: 152  
- Firmware version: 0.90.13

---

Bridge
- Improved HID joystick stability.
- DAP version: 152  
- Firmware version: 0.90.13

---

Plugin
- Added Joystick Mapping tab.
  - Similar to the Force-Travel Curve tab: right-click on the canvas to add a control point, right-click a point to remove it.
  - Supports 6 to 11 control points.
- DAP version: 152  
- Plugin version: 0.90.13
